text: @NYGovCuomo @NYGovCuomo @realdonaldtrump The reason NYC has so much severe Covid-19 is because it comes up from the sewer covers throughout the City, also the apartment shower sewers.  The strongest strain of Covid-19  is from fecal in the air.  Clog the sewers!
